commands.name: index
commands.title: Create Image
commands.subtitle: OpenAI Image Generator
commands.description: Generate a new AI image based on your text prompt

preferences.name: apiKey
preferences.title: API Key
preferences.description: API Key from OpenAI.com. Generate your own key at https://beta.openai.com/account/api-keys

preferences.name: enableDrafts
preferences.label: Enable drafts
preferences.title: Drafts
preferences.description: Any un-submitted requests will be stored as a draft and can be resumed from the main Raycast window

preferences.name: storeValue
preferences.label: Store prompt
preferences.title: Prompts
preferences.description: Store your most recently submitted prompt instead of starting from a blank slate when generating a new image
